attendees.registration.section.title: Here you can register yourself and your companions for Eid al-Adha.
attendees.registration.section.subtitle: Just fill out this formular. Afterwards we will send a QR-Code to your E-Mail. Please keep this QR-Code ready and be prepared to show it at the entrance in order to speed up the registration process.
attendees.registration.complete: Registration complete. You should soon receive an E-Mail from us.
